[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-materials](./harp-materials.md) &gt; [SolidLineMaterialParameters](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.md)

## SolidLineMaterialParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new \[\[SolidLineMaterial\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SolidLineMaterialParameters extends FadingFeatureParameters, DisplacementFeatureParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [caps](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.caps.md) | [LineCaps](./harp-datasource-protocol.linecaps.md) | Describes line caps type (<code>&quot;None&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleOut&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;TriangleIn&quot;</code>). Default is <code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>. |
|  [color](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.color.md) | number \| string | Line color. |
|  [dashColor](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.dashcolor.md) | number \| string | Line dashes color. |
|  [dashes](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.dashes.md) | [LineDashes](./harp-datasource-protocol.linedashes.md) | Describes line dash type (<code>&quot;Round&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Diamond&quot;</code>). Default is <code>&quot;Square&quot;</code>. |
|  [dashSize](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.dashsize.md) | number | Size of the dashed segments. |
|  [depthTest](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.depthtest.md) | boolean | Enables/Disable depth test. |
|  [depthWrite](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.depthwrite.md) | boolean | Enables/Disable depth write. |
|  [drawRangeEnd](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.drawrangeend.md) | number | Describes the ending drawing position for the line (in the range \[0...1\]). Default is <code>1.0</code>. |
|  [drawRangeStart](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.drawrangestart.md) | number | Describes the starting drawing position for the line (in the range \[0...1\]). Default is <code>0.0</code>. |
|  [fog](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.fog.md) | boolean | <code>SolidLineMaterial</code> extends the ThreeJS <code>RawShaderMaterial</code> that does not update fog at runtime, so instead of recompiling everything we pass it in the constructor. |
|  [gapSize](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.gapsize.md) | number | Size of the gaps between dashed segments. |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.linewidth.md) | number | Line width. |
|  [offset](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.offset.md) | number | How much to offset in world units. |
|  [opacity](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.opacity.md) | number | Line opacity. |
|  [outlineColor](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.outlinecolor.md) | number \| string | Line outline color. |
|  [outlineWidth](./harp-materials.solidlinematerialparameters.outlinewidth.md) | number | Outline width. |
